Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations and the Committee on Economomic Development

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter, in relation to requiring that all proposed rules be reviewed by the law department and the mayor’s office of operations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that all proposed rules be reviewed by the law department and the mayor’s office of operations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City charter, in relation to requiring that all proposed rules be reviewed by the law department and the mayor’s office of operations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
